plot: A mother gives up her life to protect her young daughter. The daughter, in turn, makes it her mission to see vengeance. With a sad twist of fate, the short is ultimately about how far someone can go for a loved one.
title: Vow
plot_es: A mother gives up her life to protect her young daughter. The daughter, in turn, makes it her mission to see vengeance. With a sad twist of fate, the short is ultimately about how far someone can go for a loved one.
